DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study aim investigate effect brief computerized intervention ( computer game `` Tetris '' ) intrusive memory posttraumatic stress symptom follow emergency cesarean section . Patients undergone emergency cesarian section randomly allocate either brief computerized intervention usual care within first 6 hour follow operation . Participants follow one week one month . It predict participant give brief computerized intervention develop few intrusive memory less severe clinical symptom . This inform potential future development simple computerize intervention prevent distress psychological symptom traumatic event emergency cesarean section .
DOC.brief_title: Prevention Intrusive Memories Posttraumatic Stress Symptoms After Emergency Cesarean Section
DOC.criteria: Female , age 18+ year Had emergency caesarean section within past 6 hour Have give birth live baby â‰¥ 37 week gestation Do speak French sufficiently well participate assessment Have establish intellectual disability psychotic illness Baby transfer intensive care unit birth
